rationales.achievement: He immediately plans another supplier negotiation trip despite fatigue to protect business outcomes.
rationales.tradition: He uses evening puja as a grounding ritual during a stressful workday.

rationales.achievement: He actively evaluates a major biodegradable-line decision through consultant meetings and capital planning.
rationales.tradition: He interprets company succession through a generational family lens tied to his father and son.

rationales.achievement: He returns from family dinner to analyze Q1 margins and supplier leverage, focusing on operational control.
rationales.tradition: He seeks coherence through his mother's home rituals and foods tied to his father's memory.

rationales.achievement: He is strongly status-conscious about business rankings and pushes hard on audit and supplier work the same day.
rationales.benevolence: His tunnel vision on work leads him to neglect simple relational care, like calling Shobha when late.

rationales.achievement: He prioritizes signing a high-stakes capital commitment himself rather than stepping away for a full family trip.
rationales.tradition: He expresses real attachment to Varanasi family rituals and spiritual practices even while constrained by work.

rationales.achievement: He confirms a large investment after projection review and finds clarity in decisive business action.
rationales.tradition: He justifies his duty through inherited family work norms modeled by his father.

rationales.achievement: He remains deeply engaged in technical iteration and leadership decisions despite uncertainty in trial results.
rationales.tradition: He values continuity symbols like the inherited diya and family-linked industry obligations.

rationales.achievement: He continues steering product development with delegated execution, clear trial targets, and deadlines.
rationales.tradition: He deepens commitment to temple and family practices across distance, seeing them as meaningful inheritance.
rationales.benevolence: He makes space for family by advancing travel plans and initiating a call to connect with his son.

rationales.achievement: He returns from travel and immediately reviews factory outcomes and pushes the team toward final spec.
rationales.tradition: He treats Varanasi rituals and extended-family time as deeply restorative and identity-defining.

rationales.achievement: He keeps momentum on launch execution and accepts additional leadership responsibility in the industry board.
rationales.tradition: He accepts the board role partly as continuation of cross-generational ties from his father's era.
rationales.universalism: He frames the board seat as a way to support the next wave of small manufacturers beyond his own company.
